title: House Guests
description: When her uncle asks her if she will drop off the keys of his beach house to a couple of friends of his, Allie looks forward to a day of sex with the older man that lives next door. She is disappointed to find he is not around and when the couple arrives later than expected she decides to wait until the following morning to drive back home. The man and woman take a shine to her and as they sit enjoying a drink together Allie realizes they are coming on to her. Her frustrations at missing out on sex are swept away as she becomes the centre of attention in an erotic threesome.
author: Allie Wilder
